entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
